resources.string: Click on the button below to download %1$s
Sorry, there are no options available at the moment, please try again later
Please, check WiFi or internet connection
Sorry, no such item was found, it may have been deleted, please try again later
Oops, something is wrong, we are already dealing with it
Download has been failed, please try again

How to install: \n\n 1. After downloading restart the game to use the mod you imported.
2. After downloading the mod, please load the mod once in the game and then enter the map to use the mod. If it does not take effect, please restart the game.
3. After downloading different modules, each module may be placed in different categories in the menu bar on the left side of the map, please pay attention to find it.
4. Due to the problem of the game itself, using too many mods to load may cause black screen and freeze problems, which can be solved by clearing the mod function and restarting the game.
Do you like this app?\nRate us on Google Play
